text:
Kate Middleton: The Duchess wore pearl earrings and Monsoon wedges to complete the outfit

Kate Middleton, 35, showcased a favourite closet staple on Saturday while she attended a tea part to honour 850 children of men and women who had died serving in the British military.

The Duchess glowed in a £320 See by Chloe dress at the occasion, which took place on the grounds of Buckingham Palace.

The dress featured a ruffle collar and long sleeves, and she accessorised the outfit with delicate pearl drop earrings.

Kate previously wore the outfit last September during a party for Prince George and Princess Charlotte.
title: Kate Middleton news: Thrifty Duchess of Cambridge rewears Chloe dress from last year

meta_data.description: THE DUCHESS OF CAMBRIDGE re-wore a stunning lace Chloe dress to a kids’ party at the palace yesterday, which she last wore in September last year.
